participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Quirky and light-hearted with a humorous side.
participant_1.background: I don't like sports, but I like to watch my brother play. My favorite singer is Britney Spears. My horse never talks back to me. I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work. I like to smell my own farts.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and reflective, with a passion for freedom and connection.
participant_2.background: I'm enjoying my life with my cat and hoping to find someone to share it with. I enjoy the freedom of riding my bike. I collect memories of my best friend from out of town. I wake up, take my dog, Collie, for a walk and then drink the day away. My worst fear is that I will lose my sense of humor.

content.text: I have a horse and I love it!
I like dogs but I can't have one right now.
I like to smell my own farts.
I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work.
Do you drink beer in the evening?
Not too much. I like to be able to function the next day.
I wake up, take my dog for a walk and then drink the day away.
Sounds like you need to find a new hobby.
I do have a hobby. I collect memories of my best friend from out of town.
That's sweet. What do you do with the memories?
I keep them in a scrapbook.
That's nice. I think it's a good idea to keep memories of people you love.
Yeah. I don't want to forget them.
